it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.map

Class EscapeSector

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.map.Sector
      • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.map.EscapeSector

  • public class EscapeSector
extends Sector
    The class for a specific escape sector. The reason it extends a sector is to add methods that block it after one player has used it. (See game rules for details)
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio, Matteo Pagliari
